label: Bubble Count
description: Number of bubble particles spawned when a tab or group is closed.

label: Animation Duration (ms)
description: Duration of the bubble explosion animation in milliseconds.

label: Minimum Bubble Size (px)
description: Minimum diameter of a bubble particle in pixels.

label: Bubble Size Range (px)
description: Random size variation added to the minimum. Maximum bubble size = min + range.

label: Outward Bias (px)
description: How far bubbles fly outward from the edge of the closed element.
